    public class BaseJpaDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO
    Multiple entities which inherit from same superclass, each entity will maps to different table.

    The JpaDaoSupport of Spring has been deprecated since Springv4.0, the recommended way of coding JPA is depending on EntityManager directly.

      • findById

        public <T> T findById(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
             java.lang.Object id,
             boolean allowNull)
        从接口复制的说明: DAO
        Find entity by identity, if no entity found:
        1. if allowed null, null will be returned.
        2. if null is unallowed, a DataIntegrityViolationExceptio will be thrown out.
        指定者:
        findById 在接口中 DAO
        参数:
        clazz - The class type of entity.
        id - The identify of entity.
        allowNull - Whether null can be returned.
        返回:
        a entity with given identity.

      • all

        public <T> java.util.List<T> all(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass)
        指定者:
        all 在接口中 DAO

      • single

        public <T> T single(java.lang.Class<T> entityClass)
        从接口复制的说明: DAO
        Lookup entity of a given type. If no entity found, DataIntegrityViolationException will be thrown out. If multple entities found, the 1st one will be returned.
        指定者:
        single 在接口中 DAO
        参数:
        entityClass - The type of entity.
        返回:
        1st entity.

      • single

        protected <T> T single(java.util.List<T> entities,
           boolean allowMultiple)
        Return single entity from multiple entities. The JPA interface always return a list of entities, however in some cases, we do want only one entity returned, this method will return the 1st entity in the list.
        参数:
        entities - The list of entities.
        allowMultiple - Whether there are multiple entities allowed when a querying criteria given. If true, this method will return the 1sts entity, if false, a DataIntegrityViolationException will be thrown out.
        返回:
        the 1st entity or null if no entities at all.

      • getEntityName

        protected java.lang.String getEntityName(java.lang.Class<? extends VersionEntity> clazz)

      • findSingleByNamedParams

        protected java.lang.Object findSingleByNamedParams(java.lang.String sql,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
        Only single result should be found by the querying criteria.
        参数:
        sql - The querying SQL.
        params - The parameter of querying.
        返回:
        a single result, or null if no result found.
        抛出:
        org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException - if found multiple results.

      • findSingleFromListByNamedParams

        protected java.lang.Object findSingleFromListByNamedParams(java.lang.String sql,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
        Only single result should be returned if multiple or a single result found.
        参数:
        sql - The querying sql.
        params - The parameter of querying.
        返回:
        a single result, or null if no result found.
        抛出:
        org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException - if found multiple results and no allowing multiple entities.

      • findByNamedParams

        protected java.util.List findByNamedParams(java.lang.String sql,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params,
                               int maxResult)
        Simulate the convenient method findByNamedParams of Spring LJpaDaoSupport which has been deprecated since Spring v4.x.
        参数:
        sql - The JPQL.
        params - THe parameters map of JPQL.
        maxResult - The max count of returned result. If wanna a single result, simply set it to 1(the official JPA API, Query.getSingleResult() will throw NonUniqueResultException if multiple result found.

      • findByNamedParams

        protected java.util.List findByNamedParams(java.lang.String sql,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
